text: Eteke yihamte allahara sannidhya labha karaara babe allahara paraibarte yiboraka upasyaraupe grahana karaichila se'iborae sihamtaka sahaya nakaraile kiya? Baram se'ibora sihamtara paraa heraa'i gaâ€™la, karana e'ito achila sihamtara manesaja micha pratarana; yito sihamte alika udbharana karaichila
